analysis.key_quote: Our government, our democracy, demands of people doing its work that they be of the highest integrity and skill in their respective professions and duties and that they perform their work for the benefit of the Nation and not to embrace any political party other than in the exercise not their personal vote.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses opposition to political appointees and emphasizes the need for integrity and skill in government work, which aligns with concerns about politicization and the importance of a merit-based system.
